commands_raw:
signal(emit,cam_focus,0)
Hello tiny Master
/
Salutation petit maitre
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,1)
So you are the new diver ! 
/
Je suis monsieur l'oiseau
---
i'll be your messager
/
je serais vôtre messager
---
each morning i'll catch all the new orders from the people
/
chaque matin je ferais le tour de la région pour prendre les requêtes des gens
---
Hope you will make more gold that the previou diver...
/
J'espère que vous ferez bonne forturne, 
---
Anyway, here the daily orders
/
Prenez cette lettre en guise de mission
---
signal(emit,give_letter,1)
You own me 15£ for that service
/
mes service coute 15£
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,2)
signal(emit,intrigue_index,2)
signal(emit,up_page_info_state,2)

signal(emit,npc_ls_node,day_02)
Good luck for today, tiny master
/
Bonne chance pour aujourd'hui, petit maitre
---
name: day_01

commands_raw:
signal(emit,cam_focus,0)
You are back tiny human
/
Tu es de retour petit homme
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,2)
did you finish your mission ?
it's on the letter ! 
/
as tu finis ta mission ?
c'est indiqué sur la lettre !!
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,0)
signal(emit,npc_ls_node,day_03)
signal(emit,up_page_info_state,3)
you should do it quick,
the master will be disappointed
/
fais le rapidement,
le maintre sera pas content sinon

---
name: day_02

commands_raw:
signal(emit,cam_focus,0)
you are back, AGAIN
and you didn't finish you mission
/
a nouveau de retour SANS AVOIR TERMINE la mission
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,2)
the prince want you to be fast
/
le prince vous a demandez d'être rapide
---
signal(emit,cam_focus,0)
signal(emit,up_page_info_state,4)
don't forget it, if you want to be well payed
/
ne l'oubliez pas, si vous voulez être bien payé

---
name: day_03
